original_title: The Secret Photos of the Duke and Duchess of Windsor
overview: The intimate love story of Edward VIII and Wallis Simpson as it's never been seen before. This documentary offers new insight into the romance between the King and 'the divorcee', revealing, for the first time ever, more than a thousand personal photos that the Duchess of Windsor gave to her gardener on the Duke's death and which have remained, until now, hidden in a trunk of mementoes.
title: The Secret Photos of the Duke and Duchess of Windsor
